Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 21st overall pick, by Pittsburgh in 1964...
Injured on 5/25/1967 with a Strained Groin Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 8/4/1969 with a Inflamed Rib Cage Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 4/5/1971, off Jaime Harper (Mal)...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/19/1972, hitting .500 with 3 HR, 12 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/14/1973, hitting .571 with 4 HR, 11 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/1973, hitting .427 with 4 HR, 20 RBI...
Injured on 8/18/1973 with a Pulled Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Manchester on 6/14/1974...
Injured on 6/13/1975 with a Fractured Ulna, out for 5-6 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Pontiac on 2/16/1977 to a 4-year deal worth $2,786,400 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Pontiac on 3/1/1984 to a minor league contract.
Released by Pontiac on 4/7/1984...
